This class is used to represent an article with all properties af an article of the "The Guardian" media group.

APIParser - Class in org.project
This class is used to parse the given JSON formatted String content assuming it has fields to describe an API response from the "The Guardian" and to each one of the Articles it contains.

Tokenizer - Class in org.project
This class is a wrapper that contain a tokenizer ("core NLP") from the package edu.stanford.mlp.pipeline.
Tokenizer(boolean, TokensStorage) - Constructor for class org.project.Tokenizer
This constructor is used to set: whether to do checks on the tokens or not (Tokenizer.checks); common word (Tokenizer.commonWords); the pipeline (Tokenizer.pipeline); the storage class Tokenizer.storage.
